description:
What is a prom, exactly? Yukino and Iroha have a plan to show both Hachiman and the student body the answer to that question… with Yui’s help, of course!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iroha Isshiki Is the Strongest Junior, as Expected.
Iroha Isshiki est bien la plus forte des cadettes
Yahari, Isshiki Iroha wa Saikyou no Kouhai de Aru.
كما توقعت فإيشيكي إروها أقوى كوهاي
やはり, 一色いろはは最強の後輩である.
